name: Vesuvius
description: Vesuvius pizza erupts with flavor, featuring a fiery combination of ripe tomatoes, zesty marinara sauce, melted mozzarella cheese, and savory ham slices. It's a culinary explosion that'll leave your taste buds craving more.

name: Hawaii
description: Transport yourself to Hawaii with our Hawaii pizza. With tropical flavors, it features succulent ham, juicy pineapple, and mozzarella cheese atop a bed of tangy marinara sauce and fresh tomatoes. One bite, and you'll feel the warmth of the sun.

name: Parma
description: Savor the taste of Italy with our Parma pizza. This culinary masterpiece features ripe tomatoes, peppery arugula, and savory Parmesan cheese drizzled with a hint of golden olive oil. It's a symphony of flavors that will transport you to the picturesque landscapes of Parma.

name: Quatro fromagio
description: A cheese lover's dream. This delight features a quartet of premium cheeses - creamy Fontina, nutty Parmesan, melty mozzarella, and tangy Gorgonzola. Each bite is of rich, velvety flavors that will leave you craving more.

name: Buffala
description: Experience the taste of Italy with our Bufalla pizza. Crafted with love and authenticity, it features ripe tomatoes, tangy marinara sauce, creamy buffalo mozzarella, fragrant basil leaves, and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil. It's a culinary journey to the heart of Naples.

name: Anchovese
description: Anchovy lovers rejoice! Topped with tomatoes, zesty marinara sauce, gooey mozzarella cheese, and flavorful anchovy, every bite is a burst of Mediterranean flavors that will tantalize your taste buds.

name: Napoli
description: This classic Italian delight features the finest ingredients, including tomatoes, tangy marinara sauce, buffalo mozzarella, and aromatic basil leaves. Each bite is a taste of tradition and authenticity that will transport you to the streets of Naples.

name: MolenPie Special
description: Transport yourself to the shores of the Molenbeek canal with our Mediterranean Delight pizza. Featuring a blend of sun-dried tomatoes, pesto sauce, feta cheese, Kalamata olives, red onion, and fresh spinach, each slice is a symphony of flavors that will bring you back to the bled.

name: Pepperoni Classic
description: Indulge in the timeless perfection of our Pepperoni Classic pizza. Loaded with rich tomato sauce, stretchy mozzarella cheese, and savory slices of pepperoni, every bite delivers a burst of bold and spicy flavors that pizza enthusiasts crave.

name: Margherita
description: Savor the simplicity of Italy with our Margherita pizza. Crafted with fresh tomatoes, creamy mozzarella cheese, fragrant basil leaves, and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil, each slice is a celebration of traditional flavours.

name: Vegetarian Supreme
description: Bursting with colorful vegetables including mushrooms, bell peppers, red onions, and black olives atop a base of tangy tomato sauce and melty mozzarella cheese, each bite is a wholesome and satisfying journey for your taste buds.
